long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New Reddit Redirection extension simply redirects reddit.com to new.reddit.com to force use of the "new" Reddit layout.

Notes:
Due to Reddits self imposed restrictions. You must be logged into Reddit for the addon to work. It also does not work while in incognito mode. This will be fixed in next update. For now, disable addon to log into Reddit than re-enable it and it will work.
